_source.text: Addressing what Andrew said: The tiles and integration are great ways to go about things but in some ways are still limited (Hub-Integration by Apps for example) which makes them fall short of what they promise (you need no App for that - there's one Hub) and secondly even though WP7 does this better than iOS (more information) and Android (less problematic concerning battery usage of Widgets) it doesn't really fix something that is broken on other systems and is not instantly perceived as being a better solution.
